commit_message:
feat: complete Sub-task 1D trend component integration in get_prior

- Add trend_component column to distinguish observation vs trend parameters
- Implement proper integration with extract_trend_priors and combine_obs_trend_priors
- Add comprehensive tests for missing trend types (CAR, PW, GP) and complex linear predictors
- Identify critical gap: embedded family support for sophisticated multivariate patterns
- Update task list with Sub-task 1E for embedded family investigation

Key changes:
- R/priors.R: Add trend_component="trend/observation" columns before rbind()
- tests/testthat/test-priors.R: Add 400+ lines of comprehensive trend type tests
- tasks/dev-tasks-stancode-generation-update.md: Mark 1D complete, add 1E for embedded families

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
